### encodeCounter() {#abfaf2220ba561ed163a999bafa256178}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static unsigned encodeCounter (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counterexpression">CounterExpression</a> &gt; Expressions, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter">Counter</a> C)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Encode the counter.

The encoding uses the following format: Low 2 bits - Tag: <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter/#a5e36bdc59afb1fa1af1e70a3f89a3ceca67a8514f4af2332820b159b681e49b1a">Counter::Zero(0)</a> - A <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter">Counter</a> with kind <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter/#a5e36bdc59afb1fa1af1e70a3f89a3ceca67a8514f4af2332820b159b681e49b1a">Counter::Zero</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter/#a5e36bdc59afb1fa1af1e70a3f89a3ceca4d833352a08a316752f999f56e6bf06e">Counter::CounterValueReference(1)</a> - A counter with kind <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter/#a5e36bdc59afb1fa1af1e70a3f89a3ceca4d833352a08a316752f999f56e6bf06e">Counter::CounterValueReference</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter/#a5e36bdc59afb1fa1af1e70a3f89a3ceca3414aa40642d6bfd511e941d82ed1780">Counter::Expression(2)</a> + <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counterexpression/#ae5156429537263d93d5d165c7501e49cad1416de918b7a5b4457401a093632670">CounterExpression::Subtract(0)</a> - A counter with kind <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter/#a5e36bdc59afb1fa1af1e70a3f89a3ceca3414aa40642d6bfd511e941d82ed1780">Counter::Expression</a> and an expression with kind <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counterexpression/#ae5156429537263d93d5d165c7501e49cad1416de918b7a5b4457401a093632670">CounterExpression::Subtract</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter/#a5e36bdc59afb1fa1af1e70a3f89a3ceca3414aa40642d6bfd511e941d82ed1780">Counter::Expression(2)</a> + <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counterexpression/#ae5156429537263d93d5d165c7501e49ca455946e9fb6b90813a5b9480f4063e22">CounterExpression::Add(1)</a> - <Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Encode the counter.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The encoding uses the following format:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Low 2 bits - Tag:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   Counter::Zero(0) - A Counter with kind Counter::Zero</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   Counter::CounterValueReference(1) - A counter with kind</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     Counter::CounterValueReference</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   Counter::Expression(2) + CounterExpression::Subtract(0) -</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     A counter with kind Counter::Expression and an expression</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     with kind CounterExpression::Subtract</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   Counter::Expression(2) + CounterExpression::Add(1) -</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     A counter with kind Counter::Expression and an expression</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     with kind CounterExpression::Add</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Remaining bits - Counter/Expression ID.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137" lineLink="#abfaf2220ba561ed163a999bafa256178"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#abfaf2220ba561ed163a999bafa256178">encodeCounter</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;CounterExpression&gt;</a> Expressions,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter">Counter</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Tag = unsigned(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.getKind());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.isExpression())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Tag += Expressions&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.getExpressionID()&#93;.Kind;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>.getCounterID();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> &lt;=</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">         (std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;unsigned&gt;::max() &gt;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter/#a195beefec055a20e88e7fade73e9c32f">Counter::EncodingTagBits</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Tag | (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/counter/#a195beefec055a20e88e7fade73e9c32f">Counter::EncodingTagBits</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sort the regions in an ascending order by the file id and the starting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// location. Sort by region kinds to ensure stable order for tests.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a076f93c387f454f0db13d4bc7d4e7f9c">llvm::stable&#95;sort</a>(MappingRegions, &#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/countermappingregion">CounterMappingRegion</a> &amp;LHS,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LHS.FileID != RHS.FileID)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LHS.startLoc() != RHS.startLoc())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LHS.startLoc() &lt; RHS.startLoc();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"></CodeLine>
